About Me

BIOGRAPHY:

Interested to work in the field of software and web development as a Full-Stack Developer. Constantly trying to extend and improve my coding knowledge and skills by taking various courses, exchanging experiences with other developers and building simulations of different projects (websites and apps). Also working on various freelance projects. Currently working as a Manager of Legal service, with a Law Master Degree, for a firm in the field of the publishing industry.

Skills and Experience:

Most experiance with:

- JavaScript(ES6), HTML(HTML5), CSS(CSS3)

Actively using:

- React.js, Redux, Gatsby.js, Vue.js, jQuery, Bootstramp, Sass for Front-End development

- Node.js, Express, MongoDB, GraphQL for Back-End development

Also have some knowlage of:

- JAVA, MYSQL, Python

Actively using also:

- GIT, Firebase, Adobe Photoshop, WordPress

The Institute for Textbooks and Educational Resources

- Expert Associate for Legal Affairs (2012-2019)

- Manager of Legal service (2019 - Still working)

Activities and responsibilities: Conducting research on relevant laws, regulations, and legal articles; Organizing and maintaining documents in a paper or electronic filing systems; Gathering, arranging legal documents, writing reports and case preparation; Drafting correspondence and legal documents, such as contracts and other legal acts; Representing the company in a court; Anticipating and mitigating potential legal problems involving the company; Gathering, arranging and drafting legal documents for Public Procurement procedures.

My assignment is to organize work and distribution of business obligations in the legal service of the firm. Gained working discipline, organizational abilities, working under pressure, and in cooperation with other people.

Full Stack Developer

- Full-Stack Developer Freelancer (2018 - In progress)

Currently working on various freelance projects. Trying to improve my coding knowledge and skills by creating projects for practicing and demonstration of gained skills. Worked also on some pro bono projects.

Constantly connecting with other developers with similar interests for reasons of exchanging experiences, working with them on projects and training cooperation with other coders.

In my current job and profession it's constantly needed to correspond and work with other people, so gained skills in that field I will transfer to coding.

Constantly in the pursuit of freelancing jobs and also willing to work for contractors in the country and abroad on part-time or full-time jobs and projects. In office jobs are acceptable to me under contractual defined terms, and remote jobs also.
